Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that President Gotabaya Rajapaksa ordered an investigation into a missing PMD bus, when in fact, the Deputy Director of the PMD denied the claim and stated that it was baseless.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official statement to back up the claim of a missing PMD bus.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there is a missing PMD bus based on social media posts, without providing concrete evidence or confirmation from official sources.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is provided by the Deputy Director of the PMD and the press office of the former President Maithripala Sirisena, who both deny the claim of a missing bus and state that it is in storage.
